transcript: if two people go through the same training program and one person gets the outcome and the other person doesn't it's usually because the training program doesn't account for every single skill that is required to get the outcome there are certain assumptions that come in like if someone reads my book I assume that they can speak English I mean I'm saying as simple as that sounds right there's a hundred other skills and the people who are successful faster just have more of those skills stacked up so that when they get the right information they can immediately use it
